info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 28 at 4:53PM MST until September 28 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff AZ
info.description:
FFWFGZ
The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has extended the
* Flash Flood Warning for... The Big Bug Creek in... Yavapai County in west central Arizona...
* Until 700 PM MST.
* At 453 PM MST, trained weather spotters reported 3 to 4 feet of flow in Big Bug Creek at Spring Valley. This will flow into the Cordes Lakes neighborhood through around 7 PM MST. Flash flooding is already occurring.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding in and around the Big Bug Creek.
SOURCE...Trained spotters reported.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of areas in and around the Big Bug Creek.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Spring Valley, Cordes Lakes, Mayer, Agua Fria National Monument and Cordes Junction.
This includes the following highways... State Route 69 between mile markers 263 and 270. Interstate 17 between mile markers 262 and 263.
This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Agua Fria River, Big Bug Creek and Hackberry Creek.
info.instruction:
Flash flooding of Big Bug Creek is imminent or occurring. Low water crossings in Mayer, Spring Valley, and Cordes Lakes will quickly become inundated and impassable. The South Spring Lane bridge in Spring Valley may also experience flooding. Do not attempt to cross flooded roadways, Turn Around, Don't Drown!
Low water crossings will become dangerous in heavy rain. Do not attempt to cross flooded roads. Find an alternate route.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 7:00 PM MST. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 7:00 PM MST. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 7:00 PM MST. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 7:00 PM MST. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
